title: S&P Lifts Argentina Rating, Sees Nation More Able to Repay Debt
description: S&P Global Ratings lifted Argentina’s credit score by a notch, saying that improved economic metrics and the governments increased congressional support make it better able to service its debts.
content: S&P Global Ratings lifted Argentina’s credit score by a notch, saying that improved economic metrics and the governments increased congressional support make it better able to service its debts.
